value:
As a rule, I don't join up with others.
I prefer to work alone.

Death only marks your loss, and our
enemy's gain. It grants you nothing.$k$pIf there is something you want, make
sure to survive.

I'm here by choice...for now. Why?
The answer to that will cost you
100,000 gold.

Stoking embers is useless. There's a
reason I'm called "fireman"—I put
out problems.

Gathering intel is a specialty of mine.
Give me three days, and I'll know
more about this country than you do.

I'm here on business. Don't
ask questions.

Time for me to leave. Any more than
this will draw too much attention.
Results like this don't make money.
Might be time to look for another job.

You're a good one. Guess this means
you feel the same about me.

I'm Volke. It doesn't seem like you
have work for me right now, but...you
know how to reach me.

My work? If I have to answer, I'd say
I do whatever's asked of me—but
only if the pay is good enough.$k$pI'd probably even take a job to
assassinate you. Not like it'd be
hard, given this castle's defenses.$k$pThat's not a threat. It's just how
committed I am to my contracts.$k$pLucky for you, I never take two jobs
at once, and I never quit a job early.$k$pThe smartest move you could make
now is hire me first. Doesn't matter
to me what the job is.$k$p...I see. Only reason I brought it up
is your skills have probably made you
no few enemies, but suit yourself.
せいっ
逃がさん
くっ…
不覚…
Your last mistake.
Let's get to work.
We're done.
Goodbye.
This is as far as I go...
Ha...
I'm Volke. I solve problems.
This doesn't interest me.
My occupation? You could say I'm in... intelligence.

Tell the barkeep you've need of a fireman.
You'll see me within an hour.
You want to know why I need money, do you? 100,000 gold. That's what it will cost you for me to answer that question.
Greil's death was unfortunate and unexpected.
Interested in taking on my kind of work? You certainly have the skill for it.
Got it.
*chuckle*
All paid up.
